attributes.action: Lower the cost of fuel or lose our vote !!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
this is a simple petition that will gain a lot of backing.

I'm just a normal guy trying to get by each day.

I will put it to you simply.

If you want my / our votes lower the duty on fuel.

You take 2 thirds of the total cost per litre.

If you don't do anything about it, you lose my / our votes.

Can't be put any clearer than that.

regards phil.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
